abstract: If you are a strategic buyer about to be found in breach of your acquisition agreement, which would you prefer: a remedy whereby you are required to pay monetary damages, or one where you are forced to complete the deal (the remedy of specific performance)?
lead_paragraph: If you are a strategic buyer about to be found in breach of your acquisition agreement, which would you prefer: a remedy whereby you are required to pay monetary damages, or one where you are forced to complete the deal (the remedy of specific performance)?

headline.main: AT&T and the Theory of Specific Performance
